thread.title: NYC Creighton BIG EAST Basketball Tournament Stay
thread.title_full: NYC Creighton BIG EAST Basketball Tournament Stay - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah L
title: NYC Creighton BIG EAST Basketball Tournament Stay
text: We've been staying at/working with this hotel for the 2017 Creighton Men's BIG EAST Basketball Tournament for a few years now and their staff is always top notch. Staff members who went above and beyond for us included: Mary Perez (overall contact), Brian Sokolovski (Catering) and David, Seth and Diego with Security to ensure all of our events went off without a hitch. Thanks to everyone for making our stay a success!
